name: Mind Swap, Major
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Occult Adventures © 2015, Paizo Inc.
target: one creature of your same race
text: The spell functions as mind swap, except as noted above. In addition, after 24 hours, instead of using each other's hit points, You each revert to your original hit points, modified by your new Constitution modifiers. This spell can be reversed only with miracle, wish, or another major mind swap.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料（价值10000gp的钻石）
target_zh: 与你种族相同的一个生物
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同换身术（Mind Swap）一般，不过会有上述区别。此外在24小时之后，取代使用对方的生命值，你们两者会恢复到原本的生命值，并且以新的体质调整值进行调整。该法术仅能被神迹术（Miracle）、祈愿术（Wish）或另一个强效换身术（Mind Swap, Major）所反转。
